properties.name: displayName
properties.description: The name of this Contact, suitable for display to end users.

properties.name: name
properties.description: An object containing all components of a persons name.

properties.name: nickname
properties.description: A casual name by which to address the contact.

properties.name: phoneNumbers
properties.description: An array of all the contact's phone numbers.

properties.name: emails
properties.description: An array of all the contact's email addresses.

properties.name: addresses
properties.description: An array of all the contact's addresses.

properties.name: ims
properties.description: An array of all the contact's IM addresses.

properties.name: organizations
properties.description: An array of all the contact's organizations.

properties.name: photos
properties.description: An array of the contact's photos.

properties.name: categories
properties.description: An array of all the user-defined categories associated with the contact.

properties.name: urls
properties.description: An array of web pages associated with the contact.
